effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   When the holder is [attracted]{move:attract}, it consumes this item to cure the attraction.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Consumed to cure infatuation. Gen V: Also removes Taunt, Encore, Torment, Disable, and Cursed Body.

flavor_text_entries.text:
持たせた　ポケモンが　自由に
技を　だせなくなったときに
１度だけ　回復する。

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It snaps the holder out of infatuation.
It can be used only once.

Strumento monouso da dare a un
Pokémon. Ne annulla l’infatuazione.

Asombrosa esfera que debe llevar Pikachu y que
aumenta su Ataque y su Ataque Especial.

Ein Item, das einem Pokémon zum Tragen
gegeben werden kann. Hilft einmalig bei
eingeschränktem Handlungsspielraum.

Objet à tenir. Empêche le Pokémon
de tomber amoureux.
Ne peut être utilisé qu’une fois.

지니게 한 포켓몬은
헤롱헤롱 상태가 되었을 때
한 번만 회복한다.

もたせた　ポケモンが　じゆうに
わざを　だせなくなったときに
いちどだけ　かいふくする。

An item to be held by a Pokémon. It
snaps the holder out of infatuation.
It can be used only once.

An item to be held by a Pokémon. It
snaps the holder out of infatuation.
It can be used only once.

d’un Pokémon. Ne peut être utilisé
qu’une fois.

snaps the holder out of infatuation.
It can be used only once.

It snaps the holder out of

snaps POKéMON out
